name: get_timetable
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool flixbus_v2.
Tool description: New Flixbus API that provides Flixbus travel search, timetables, stops, cities, routes and autocomplete. 
API description: Fetches the timetable for a given FlixBus station and date using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

date.description: Date for which to fetch the timetable, in the format DD.MM.YYYY.
